customMethods.name: newMethod
customMethods.script:
"""	
	tags = system.tag.readBlocking(["[default]Total Spain/Operators/CECOEL_ROL2", "[default]Total Spain/Operators/CECOEL_ROL2.Quality", "[default]Total Spain/Operators/CECORE_ROL2", "[default]Total Spain/Operators/CECORE_ROL2.Quality"])
#	tags = system.tag.readBlocking("[.]CECOEL_ROL2", "[.]CECOEL_ROL2.Quality", "[.]CECORE_ROL2", "[.]CECOEL_ROL2.Quality")
	
	CECOEL = "[default]Total Spain/Operators/CECOEL_ROL2"
	CECOEL_qual = "[default]Total Spain/Operators/CECOEL_ROL2.Quality"
	CECORE = "[default]Total Spain/Operators/CECORE_ROL2"
	CECORE_qual = "[default]Total Spain/Operators/CECORE_ROL2.Quality"
	converted = "".join([str(CECOEL), "1" if CECOEL_qual == "Good" else "0", str(CECORE), "1" if CECORE_qual == "Good" else "0"])
	
	
	CECOEL = converted in ["0101", "0110", "0111", "1001"]
	CECORE= converted in ["1111","0011","1101","1100"]
	LASTGOODCMD = converted in ["0011","1000"]
	
	if CECOEL:
		system.tag.writeBlocking("[default]Total Spain/Operators/OperatorSelect", "CECOEL")
#	    return "CECOEL"
	elif CECORE:
		system.tag.writeBlocking("[default]Total Spain/Operators/OperatorSelect", "CECORE")
#	    return "CECORE";
	elif LASTGOODCMD:
		system.tag.writeBlocking("[default]Total Spain/Operators/OperatorSelect", "LASTGOODCMD")
#	    return "LASTGOODCMD"
	else:
	    return 'option not mapped'	# implement your method here
